SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render

Class SoundEffectImplement

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render.SoundEffectImplement
public class SoundEffectImplement extends Object
responsible for managing and playing sound effects when certain actions occur in the game. It stores sound effects actions mapped to specific game locations and triggers them based on the player's movements.

    Modifier and Type

    void
    eachFillAction(GameState gameState, Class<?> type)
    Fills the SoundActionMap with actions that should trigger sound effects when the player reaches certain tiles containing specific types of game items
    void
    fillAction(GameState gameState)
    use the method eachFillAction() to implement different sound effects
    void
    locationMatch(GameState gameState)
    Matches the player's current location to a sound action in the SoundActionMap, and if a match is found, executes the associated action (plays the sound) and then removes it from the map.

    mute the sound effect music

      public SoundEffectImplement()

  • Method Details

    • sound

      public static void sound(String type) throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, IOException, LineUnavailableException
      Plays the sound effect when a key or other specific item is collected.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of item being collected, used to determine the corresponding sound effect.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the audio format is unsupported.
      IOException - if there is an error reading the sound file.
      LineUnavailableException - if the audio line cannot be opened.

    • mute

      public static void mute(boolean mute)
      mute the sound effect music
      Parameters:
      mute - to decide should mute the music or not

    • eachFillAction

      public void eachFillAction(GameState gameState, Class<?> type)
      Fills the SoundActionMap with actions that should trigger sound effects when the player reaches certain tiles containing specific types of game items
      Parameters:
      gameState - the current state of the game.
      type - the class type of the game item to match.

    • fillAction

      public void fillAction(GameState gameState)
      use the method eachFillAction() to implement different sound effects
      Parameters:
      gameState - the current state of the game.

    • locationMatch

      public void locationMatch(GameState gameState)
      Matches the player's current location to a sound action in the SoundActionMap, and if a match is found, executes the associated action (plays the sound) and then removes it from the map.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the current state of the game.
